attributes.action: Esther McVey to resign in light of 'mistimed'Hillsborough Tweety
attributes.additional_details: Esther McVey, MP for Wirral West took it upon herself to take cheap political shots during the Hillsborough tribute service on Twitter, a service of which she did not even attend herself. Very distasteful and insulting to all, but especially those on Merseyside and those who had a family member or friend lost on that tragic day 25 years ago. I suggest she resign in light of failing to recognise her actions, and the impact on which it has had.
